title: 10x App Speed

problem.title: Challenge

login.exp: Eliminated the white screen and UI lag previously experienced by users after login.

qa.finding: QA reported page lag exceeding 10s after login.

api.title: API Check

state.title: State Inspection

skip.name: Enable Global Skip Logic

p3.issue: Data fetch too fast after upgrade caused deletion before subscription
p3.solution: Adjust Op Order: Clean before nav vs. Clean after entry
